document_data.mainbody:
Lake Mogador was a crucial central location in Damara for both commercial and political reasons.
Given the lakes position as the convergence point for most of Damaras waterways, nearly all goods leaving Damara by water passed through the lake at some point. To protect their interests, the Damaran baronies of Morov, Ostel and Polten all maintained heavily armed vessels on the lake in addition to their regular commercial ships.
Lake Mogador was literally situated in the center of Damara bordering several major baronies and duchies. Both the Goliad River and Icelace River emptied into the lake, making it the convergence of both of these rivers as well as of their major tributaries, the Beaumaris River and the Galena Snake respectively. The lake emptied into the Great Imphras River, which flowed south into Impiltur.
Following the fall of Zhengyi the Witch-King in the , Lake Mogador became the sight of a simmering conflict between the southern baronies of Damara as they jockeyed for control over the critical waterway, with some small skirmishes occurring between the fleets of Ostel and Polten.
* Helgabal
* Praka
* Portith
* Trailsend
* Withermeet
